attributes.action: include Fridays as part of the weekend, thus reducing the working week to 4 days (whilst still paying us for 5 days).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The weekend is always over too quickly. Before you've had time to "wind down" it's time to "wind back up" again.
By increasing the weekend to include a Friday, the UK population would be far happier and stress free.
(Oh, by the way, we still want to be paid for 5 days work though)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
